import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import IndexNavbar from "components/Navbars/IndexNavbar.js"; import { ReactNativeIcon, JSIcon, ExpressJSIcon, PythonIcon, DjangoIcon, HTMLIcon, PostgresIcon, AndroidIcon, } from '../components/Icons'; import ProjectsLinksButton from '../components/ProjectLinksButton'; import data from '../data.json'; const Projects = props => { const projects = data.projects; useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0; document.body.classList.toggle("profile-page"); return () => { document.body.classList.toggle("profile-page"); } }, []); const displayBackgroundIndex = num => { if (num < 10) { return '0' + num; } return '' + num; } return (
{ projects.map((project, index) => { if (index === 0) { return (

My Projects

{project.name}

{displayBackgroundIndex(index)}

A cross-platform marketplace app for local stores to facilitate sales and deliveries. A convenient one-stop shop for all things local. Integrated with ExpressJS microservices. Developed for Gophr App Inc.

); } }) }

Personal Portfolio (v2)

02

My Current personal website designed in React, complete with project portfolio, and a fun command line interface.

Invoice Manager

03

An online dashboard that allows business owners to create invoices, assign invoices to clients, and manage invoices, and use analytics to track expenditures.

Android CDN

04

A simple drag and drop CDN that downloads any uploaded content onto an android device instantly. This project served as an introduction to advanced background services in Android.

Android In-store Kiosk

05

An unattended in-store kiosk for efficient ordering of products and running transactions in a convenience store. Integrates with a Django REST API. Developed for 360Fuel.

); }; export default Projects;
